html: Congratulations to @Lizziearmanto on becoming the first woman to complete the infamous loop yesterday. She pulled it just after our @nextvr event ended. It was an inspiring display of fierce determination and skill, and we at @birdhouse are incredibly proud.pic.twitter.com/8ekbUrxkOr

html: I had a blast skating a legendary clover bowl with @MikeMcGill_ while shooting this video for our friends at @HomeBayinc. #HomeBay is a local San Diego startup with technology that helps people who are ready to buy or sell a home save money. #ad #realestate #thehomebaywaypic.twitter.com/Yua4lW9p92
text: I had a blast skating a legendary clover bowl with @MikeMcGill_ while shooting this video for our friends at @HomeBayinc. #HomeBay is a local San Diego startup with technology that helps people who are ready to buy or sell a home save money.  #ad #realestate #thehomebaywaypic.twitter.com/Yua4lW9p92

html: TSA agent (staring intently): I’m trying to figure out who you look like before checking your ID. Me: ok TSA: that cyclist Armstrong! Nearby agent: that ain’t Lance Armstrong Me: he’s right TSA: oh you look like that skateboarder (checks ID). Same last name too! Crazy! Me: crazy – at Detroit metro airport Departure
text:
TSA agent (staring intently): I’m trying to figure out who you look like before checking your ID.
Me: ok
TSA: that cyclist Armstrong!
Nearby agent: that ain’t Lance Armstrong 
Me: he’s right
TSA: oh you look like that skateboarder (checks ID). Same last name too! Crazy!
Me: crazy – at Detroit metro airport Departure

html: The powerful, touching documentary Minding The Gap is now available on @Hulu & select screenings. I can’t recommend it enough. html: Just saw #SearchingMovie (starring @Johnthecho & @therealdebramessing) and I am shook. It’s a gripping, clever thriller experienced through our breakneck era of social media. I highly recommend seeing it (opens everywhere Aug 31), and maybe checking your kids’ webcasts...pic.twitter.com/EW0tX113GV

html: I have a pair of tickets to a screening TONIGHT of #SearchingMovie to the first person to answer this question correctly: the first skatepark I ever visited was Oasis in 1978. I tried to go to another SD skatepark but I wasn’t old enough, and it closed shortly after. Which park?
text: I have a pair of tickets to a screening TONIGHT of #SearchingMovie to the first person to answer this question correctly: the first skatepark I ever visited was Oasis in 1978. I tried to go to another SD skatepark but I wasn’t old enough, and it closed shortly after. Which park?

html: I asked Felipe Nunes - on his first trip to California - l if he’s ever dropped in on vert and he quickly replied (in Portuguese) no but he wants to. So today he came to my ramp and this happened... without any hesitation. This dude rips.pic.twitter.com/nbtmsgTyr7

html: March 13, 1998: Gap commercial with @andymacdonald & an army of inliners. Fun facts: I got sideswiped by George Clooney’s [then] gf on the way to the studio, and then broke my elbow on a bs 180 over the launch box during the shoot. Luckily this Indy stiffy made the cut so I got $pic.twitter.com/66SDpr8Aza
text: March 13, 1998: Gap commercial with @andymacdonald & an army of inliners. Fun facts: I got sideswiped by George Clooney’s [then] gf on the way to the studio, and then broke my elbow on a bs 180 over the launch box during the shoot. Luckily this Indy stiffy made the cut so I got $pic.twitter.com/66SDpr8Aza

html: Just returned from #partyattheponds, a gathering of diehard vert skaters that reminds me of a simpler time in skateboarding; misfits getting together, listening to punk & encouraging each other to push their limits. The hairs are grey but the passion is timeless @CameraJesuspic.twitter.com/29uWdtqVws
text:
Just returned from #partyattheponds, a gathering of diehard vert skaters that reminds me of a simpler time in skateboarding; misfits getting together, listening to punk & encouraging each other to push their limits. The hairs are grey but the passion is timeless

html: We have a new @THF program of Skatepark Ambassadors, encouraging people to share stories of how a skatepark has affected them. text:
We have a new @THF program of Skatepark Ambassadors, encouraging people to share stories of how a skatepark has affected them. Just got this from @steveo:

html: Flight attendant checking overhead bins, sees four skateboards Him, jokingly: "is Tony Hawk on this flight or something?" Looks down, sees me Him: "I guess he is"
text:
Flight attendant checking overhead bins, sees four skateboards
Him, jokingly: "is Tony Hawk on this flight or something?"
Looks down, sees me
Him: "I guess he is"

html: Me trying to rekindle my street career before Tokyo 2020 Also: Happy 4th! "If we don't get some cool rules ourselves, pronto, we'll just be bogus too" pic.twitter.com/YztWfgGdiv
text:
Me trying to rekindle my street career before Tokyo 2020 
Also: Happy 4th! "If we don't get some cool rules ourselves, pronto, we'll just be bogus too" pic.twitter.com/YztWfgGdiv
